statement.title: Problem Description
Input
statement.content:
First line, number of test cases, T.
Following are T test cases. For each test case, the first line is n, number of variables in the program. The following lines is the program.

Number of lines in the input <= 500000

statement.title: Output
statement.content: T lines. Each line contains n numbers. If the variable is live, output 1; if the variable is dead, output -1; if the variable is half-dead, output 0.

statement.title: Sample Input
statement.content:
10
1
end

a 1
end
1
u 1
end

a 1
u 1
end

a 1
end

if
